articles.author: James Glenday
articles.title: Majority of Australians not convinced Prince Charles should be king, Vote Compass reveals - ABC News
articles.description: Prince Charles is next in line to take over as Australia's head of state, but data reveals there is growing support for a republic.
articles.content:
A slim majority of Australians appear opposed to Prince Charles becoming king when Queen Elizabeth II dies, according to data from the ABC's Vote Compass.
Key points:
<ul><li>About 53pc of people a… [+4912 chars]

articles.author: David Marin-Guzman, Jonathan Shapiro
articles.title: Reserve Bank warns of wage-price spiral as unions push for pay - The Australian Financial Review
articles.description: The Reserve Bank has warned of a wage-price spiral if unions exploit the low jobless rate to push for higher pay rises to compensate for an inflation rate tipped to peak at higher than 6 per cent.
articles.content:
By the middle of 2023 the real value of wages would only be at the level they were at the end of 2011, the union peak body said.
This is the result of nearly a decade of low wage growth and inaction… [+7152 chars]

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: SpaceX capsule brings astronauts home - The West Australian
articles.description: A SpaceX Crew Dragon capsule carrying four astronauts has splashed down off Florida after the crew spent nearly six months at the International Space Station.
articles.content: The third long-duration astronaut team launched by SpaceX to the International Space Station has splashed down in the Gulf of Mexico to end months of research ranging from space-grown chilies to robo… [+2721 chars]

articles.title: Devolver Digital’s Steam Sale Is Live Now, And Has Brutally Murdered My Wallet - Kotaku Australia
articles.description: Get ready to make some very poor financial decisions, because the wild folks over at Devolver Digital are having a ridiculous Steam sale.
articles.content: Devolver Digital is known for not taking itself too seriously. It’s also the publisher of some of the stranger games in the indie game market. Their work includes some of the bestindies of last year.… [+1494 chars]
